item.title: Building a Lexical Analyzer in Java
item.description: Building Your Own Programming Language: Part 1 If you are a computer geek like me, building your own programming language is probably on your bucket list. In this post I will go through the first steps in building a programming language. Interpreter or Compiler The first hurdle that we need to overcome in our quest to build a programming language is to decide whether we would like the language to be interpreted or compiled.

item.title: Hello
item.description: Introduction I started my journey into the world of Computer Science on May 14, 2016. I had just finished all requirements for senior year and I decided to try and learn something new with all of my spare time. At first, I thought programming was only for the brightest minds of the world so I didn’t expect to learn much or even enjoy it. Then I stumbled upon a fun website codeacademy.
